span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: While certainly eroticism is linked and a part of seduction, it is not the only part. Seduction is a wonderful and complex process and the RDL would like to present a balanced and respectful approach to it.

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: When looking for materials on seduction, while there are many to choose from it seems from an RDL perspective that they focus only on certain facets of attraction and sometimes not in a balanced way.

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: It is our opinion at RDL that seduction is the activity of demonstrating the skills of emotional support along with the practice of the mechanisms of eroticism with a potential partner (preferably pre selected through the axes of compatibility). As such a comprehensive material or a set of them we feel has not yet been written. There is good information in most of the many seduction materials available but we feel we cannot present a set of them as their coverage would not be complete.

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.font: * Here we need materials that are respectful to both genders
